name: Apple
description: A crisp, sweet red fruit high in fiber and vitamins.

name: Banana
description: A soft, tropical fruit rich in potassium.

name: Orange
description: A juicy citrus fruit full of vitamin C.

name: Strawberry
description: A small, red, sweet fruit with tiny seeds on the outside.

name: Grapes
description: A small, juicy fruit that grows in clusters and comes in various colors.

name: Pineapple
description: A tropical fruit with a sweet and tart flavor and a spiky exterior.

name: Watermelon
description: A large, juicy fruit with a green rind and red interior, ideal for summer.

name: Blueberry
description: A small, round berry that is high in antioxidants.

name: Mango
description: A juicy, tropical fruit with a sweet, tangy flavor.

name: Pear
description: A sweet, juicy fruit with a grainy texture and smooth skin.

name: Cherry
description: A small, red fruit with a sweet flavor and a pit inside.

name: Kiwi
description: A small, brown fruit with green flesh and a tangy flavor.
